snippet.title: she dreams elsewhere: official trailer (coming soon)
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on STEAM! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/492540/She_Dreams_Elsewhere/

(And yes, it's still coming out soon lol)

SHE DREAMS ELSEWHERE is a surreal adventure RPG about dreams and the extent to which they mirror reality. You play as Thalia, an anxiety-ridden, comatose woman who delve into her dreams and confront her inner nightmares after realizing she's trapped in a coma.

Unfortunately, some nightmares are harder to confront than others...

It’s a deeply personal narrative dealing with real world themes such as mental health and self-identity combined with strategic turn-based combat, mind-bending levels, and a surreal, visually-striking world ripe for exploration. Welcome to your nightmare - enjoy your stay!

Full game to release soon for STEAM / XBOX / NINTENDO SWITCH! Keep in touch and follow the game on social media!

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/492540/She_Dreams_Elsewhere/
WEBSITE & DEV BLOG: https://studiozevere.com/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/StudioZevere
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/studiozevere/

TRAILER SONG: Michaela - "New Moon"
https://soundcloud.com/rat_mic/new-moon
https://twitter.com/r4tmic
